definition: to save food/to go on a diet
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
to economize on clothes and food/to scrimp and save (idiom)

sentences.english: No sugar in my coffee, please; I'm dieting .
sentences.chinese: 请不要给我的咖啡放糖，我在节食。

sentences.english: Spindler hopes we soon won't need to diet at all.
sentences.chinese: Spindler希望在不久的将来，我们不必节食。

sentences.english: He would put on weight if he ate too much.
sentences.chinese: 他本来是会发胖的，可是他加意节食，起根不会多吃。

sentences.english: The doctor put my uncle on a diet because he was over-weight.
sentences.chinese: 医生要我叔叔节食，因为他太胖了。

sentences.english: "Water is a great strategy for dieters because it has no calories," says Madeline Fernstrom of the University of Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 水是节食者的伟大对策，因为它没有热量。

sentences.english: LOS ANGELES - City officials are putting South Los Angeles on a diet.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉机的市政官员在给整个南洛杉机人节食。

sentences.english: She is on a diet in order to keep a willowy figure.
sentences.chinese: 为了保持苗条的身材，她正在节食。

sentences.english: White fat is the energy- caching padding that vexes doctors and dieters.
sentences.chinese: 白色脂肪是令医生和节食者头疼的储藏能量的物质。

sentences.english: Do you diet to keep slim?
sentences.chinese: 你靠节食来保持身材么？

sentences.english: He'd rather economize on clothes and food than travel.
sentences.chinese: 他宁愿俭衣节食，而不愿节省旅游开销。

sentences.english: This kind of negative thinking is why people don't stay on diets for long.
sentences.chinese: 恰是这类长极的主意，让人们不能久长地保持节食。

sentences.english: The biggest nutritional mistake you can do is trying to lose weight by undereating.
sentences.chinese: 节食在减肥过程中带来最大限度的营养缺失。

sentences.english: Rules sometimes remind us too much of dieting.
sentences.chinese: 规则有时令人想起太多的节食。

sentences.english: Non-dieters pay more attention to their level of satiety , or fullness.
sentences.chinese: 非节食者则较留意他们的饱足感或满足感。

sentences.english: Does dieting really help with long-term weight control?
sentences.chinese: 节食真的有助于长期控制体重吗？

sentences.english: No sugar in my coffee please. I am on a diet.
sentences.chinese: 请不要给我的咖啡放糖，我在节食。

definition: to lose weight (intentionally)/to slim down/(Tw) to downsize (a business)
lit. shut your mouth, move your legs (motto for losing weight)
pinyin: guan3 zhu4 zui3 mai4 kai1 tui3

definition: to put on weight/to get fat
abstain from certain food (as when ill)/avoid certain foods/be on a diet
